message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a good amount
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
You were generous, I'll be a bit more generous too, but I still want the bigger share
This is my final offer - take it or leave it.  Every round costs us money!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll give you a tiny bit more than last time, that's my best offer
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time.  50/50 is the fairest and we both lose if this keeps going.
